block.p: Theater

'SEVEN IN ONE BLOW, OR THE BRAVE LITTLE KID,' an interactive adaptation of the Brothers Grimm fairy tale, by the Axis Theater Company, 1 Sheridan Square, off Seventh Avenue, West Village, (212)807-9300. Tonight at 7; tomorrow and Sunday at 2 and 4 p.m. Tickets: $10; children, $5.

'CLARA'S CHRISTMAS DREAMS,' a musical version of ''The Nutcracker,'' at the Theater at St. Clement's Church, 423 West 46th Street, Clinton, (212)353-3101. Today at 2 and 7 p.m.; tomorrow at 1, 4 and 7 p.m; Sunday at 2 and 5 p.m. Through Dec. 31. Tickets: $50.
'THE NUTCRACKER,' by Ballet for Young Audiences, at the LaGuardia Performing Arts Center, 47th Avenue at Van Dam Street, Long Island City, Queens, (718)482-5151. Tomorrow at 2 p.m. Tickets: $12.

'PUSS IN BOOTS: A BAD PLAY WITH SONGS', a satirical version with pantomime, at the John Houseman Studio Theater, 450 West 42nd Street, Clinton, (888)507-6909. Tonight at 8; tomorrow and Sunday at 2 and 8 p.m. Tickets: $25.

'FRANKIE & THE BURBS,' a musical comedy with a teenage Frankenstein, at Downtown Art, 64 East Fourth Street, East Village, (212)505-0835. Tonight and tomorrow night at 7:30, and Sunday at 2 p.m. Tickets: $5; children, $4.

'EXTRAORDINARY!,' a musical about a boy who seeks help for his hearing-impaired cousin, by the Vital Children's Theater, at the McGinn/Cazale Theater, Broadway at 76th Street, fourth floor, (212)352-3101. Tomorrow at 1 p.m.; Sunday at 1 and 3 p.m. Tickets: $15.
'SONG IN THE NIGHT,' the barn animals' musical account of the birth of Jesus, tomorrow at 2 p.m., at the Mark Hellinger Theater, 51st Street at Broadway. Free; (212)541-6300, ext. 270.

'ANIMAL CRACKERS,' by the puppeteer Jim West, tomorrow at 2 p.m., presented by Theaterworks/USA, at Kingsborough Community College, 2001 Oriental Boulevard, Manhattan Beach, Brooklyn, (718)368-5596. Tickets: $8.
'THE PIRATES OF PENZANCE,' a 50-minute version, by Inside Broadway, tomorrow at 10:30 a.m. at the Lucille Lortel Theater, 121 Christopher Street, West Village, (212)279-4200. Tickets: $15.
Events

'AMAHL AND THE NIGHT VISITORS', the Gian Carlo Menotti holiday show, by the Little Orchestra Society, at Avery Fisher Hall, Lincoln Center, (212)971-9500. Tomorrow at 11 a.m. and 1 p.m. Tickets: $10 to $35.
'SOFRITO!,' stories, songs and dances from Latin America and the Bronx, tomorrow at 3 p.m., at El Museo del Barrio, 1230 Fifth Avenue, at 104th Street, (212)660-7130. Admission: $15; under 10, $5.

'WOODWINDS,' an introduction, with Jim Blanton and Goliard Concerts. Sunday at 3 p.m. at the Colden Center at Queens College, Kissena Boulevard and the Long Island Expressway, Flushing, (718)793-8080. Tickets: $12.
For Children.

SPARE TIMES
